text: is a Japanese singer and songwriter. == Discography == Studio albums # Excitement of Youth (青春のエキサイトメント) # Momentary Sixth Sense (瞬間的シックスセンス) Extended plays # Tamago # Nikumarekko Yo ni Habakaru # Ai wo Tsutaetaida toka Single As lead artist # "Anata Kaibou Junaika (Shine)" (貴方解剖純愛歌~死ね~) # "Ikite Itanda yo na" (生きていたんだよな) # "Ai wo Tsutaetaida toka" (愛を伝えたいだとか) # "Kimi wa Rock wo Kikanai" (君はロックを聴かない) # "Only Under the Full Moon" (満月の夜なら) # "Marigold" (マリーゴールド) # "Let the Night" (今夜このまま) # "Haru no Hi" (ハルノヒ) # "The Smell of a Midsummer Night" (真夏の夜の匂いがする) # "Her Blue Sky" (空の青さを知る人よ) As featured artist # "Nakidashisou da yo" (泣き出しそうだよ) - (Radwimps featuring Aimyon) == Awards == Year Ceremony Award Work Result 2017 FM Q League Award Grand Prix "Kimi wa Rock wo Kikanai" 2019 Space shower music award Best Creative Works MTV VMAJ Best Female Video "Let the Night" 61st Japan Record Awards Excellence Album Award Shunkanteki Sixth Sense Billboard Japan Music Awards Artist of the Year Mnet Asian Music Awards Best Asian Artist - Japan ==References== Category:Japanese singer-songwriters Category:J-pop
title: Aimyon
